resources.string: 1. Why isn\'t a new entry created for a class when I open the app and the same class again later\?\n\nThe basic concept of this app is attendance is done atmost once a day for a class. So if you open the same class and start doing attendance again you are correcting the attendance of that particular day.
2. Will the register consist of attendance of all the dates or just the dates I take attendance\?\n\nJust the days you take it
3. Can I correct the attendance of a student after I close the app\?\n\nYes you can by opening the class again and sliding to the desired student\'s roll number.

4. Why isn\'t the attendance of all the days shown in the register\?\n\nRegister shows the sum total of all the days attendance has been carried out in the last column and shows the attendance of atmost last 6 working days.
5. Can I export the attendance to a Spreadsheet \(Excel\) file format\?\n\nYup\! Just press export in attendance register tab for the desired class.
6. Can I mail the spreadsheet file\?\n\nOf Course you can do that\! First export it and then mailing options are provided
7. Where is the exported file stored\?\n\nIt is stored in the \"Download\" folder of Internal Storage
8. What does present for 10 out of 12 days mean\?\n\nIt means the current student is present for 10 days out of the total 12 working days including today.
